about_the_game:
Play the role of a spirit who guides the forest dwellers and guests through their day, helping them meet their goals in this peaceful, family-friendly turn-based puzzle.

Be one with the invisible yet ever-present soul of the forest that helps everyone to find their path. Feel free to practice your planning skills and think several steps ahead to create a perfect route for every character. Or just try different ways and see which one works. The game doesn’t punish you and encourages the retry by allowing you to undo each action while solving the puzzle.

Carefully crafted world

Enjoy the peaceful setting with simple, non-stressful tasks. Participate in festivities and occasionally find some secrets hidden in the woods. Almost every level introduces a new character or concept—no one knows what awaits you after the next turn.

Variety of Characters

There are many characters in the game, and each one is unique in something, just as we are. Different classes of characters offer different mechanics. Different characters within one class vary in a subtle way. Explore their traits and quirks in different settings and find a perfect path for each and every one of them.

Many levels to solve

There are many tasks to solve, from collecting fruits and berries and chatting with friends to trick-or-treating or playing with spirits during seasonal festive events. Complete them all in the order you choose. All puzzles are grouped into four seasons of the year, and it’s up to you which season to explore first.

Development plans

The game is currently in development, and the plans are to release it for desktop platforms by the end of 2025. Please wishlist and follow us. Your support is much appreciated!
